welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Brighton, the charming coastal city known for its beautiful beaches, bustling boardwalk, and lively atmosphere. We hope you'll have a wonderful time exploring all that our city has to offer and making unforgettable memories."

restaurants.name: Brighton Hot Dog Shoppe
restaurants.description: Brighton Hot Dog Shoppe is a hot dog joint located in Beaver.

restaurants.name: Brady's Run Grille
restaurants.description: Brady's Run Grille is a american restaurant located in New Brighton.

restaurants.name: Kretchmar's Bakery
restaurants.description: Kretchmar's Bakery is a bakery located in Beaver.

restaurants.name: Yama Japanese Restaurant
restaurants.description: Yama Japanese Restaurant is a sushi restaurant located in Beaver.

restaurants.name: Mario's Woodfired Pizzeria
restaurants.description: Mario's Woodfired Pizzeria is a pizzeria located in Beaver.

terminals.name: Jeppesen Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Denver International Airport, housing check-in counters, security checkpoints, and baggage claim areas.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving primarily United Airlines and its Star Alliance partners.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving primarily Southwest Airlines and its subsidiary, AirTran Airways.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving primarily Frontier Airlines and its codeshare partners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a faster premium option available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jeffco Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Jeffco Airport is exclusively for private flights and offers VIP services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options and a gift shop.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling by private jet, the airport offers a separate terminal with luxurious amenities and personalized services.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
